basicDefault.front: What percentage of the land in the state of Nevada is owned by the government?
How many acres of pizza are served in the United States every day?
What organ in the human body lacks nerves despite the fact that it acts as the central command for the central nervous system?
What kills 4 times as many people as sharks per year?
What is part of a database that holds only one type of information?
'.MOV' extension refers usually to what kind of file?
What is the term to ask the computer to put information in order numerically or alphabetically?
What city was located just miles away from Mount Vesuvius volcano?

clozeDefault.text: At the drop of a hat
